overview.en: INRT is a decentralized stable digital currency issued by Libra Xs Foundation, and its value is pegged with INR at a ratio of 1:1. Issuance based on blockchain technology and smart contract technology ensures transparency and allows audits to be efficient and convenient
overview.zh: INRT是由Libra Xs Foundation发行的去中心化稳定数字货币，其价值与印度卢比1：1锚定。基于区块链技术和智能合约技术发行，保证了透明度，让审计能够高效便捷
